results.content: This is a good course with interesting insights and strong methods to solve logical puzzles. I missed the type of problems with geometrical pictures to complete - the ones I have difficulties to solve.
results.content_html: This is a good course with interesting insights and strong methods to solve logical puzzles. I missed the type of problems with geometrical pictures to complete - the ones I have difficulties to solve.

results.content: Very informal introduction to logic puzzles, but expansive.
results.content_html: Very informal introduction to logic puzzles, but expansive.

results.content:
It was a really great course. I was not aware of these types of possible questions in tech interviews. I would have had a rude awakening if I didn't discover this course. 

The only reason why I gave it 4 and a half stars is because I wish there were a few more exercises and more different types of puzzles to solve. Other than that, it's a great course and now I will be looking for other logical courses and to brush up with my math. Thank you Roman!

response.content:
Thanks for the review!
I am in process of creating a new bigger course with more puzzles and more practice.

results.content: Quite a clear explanation of general definitions for those, who are not deeply in the topic. I do like as well the easiness of solutions given to the tasks as i myself had a couple of such interviews too and actually was told that I was overcomplicating it. Great job.
